body:
Hey everyone, i don't mean the game itself, but how did the NAME for Nebula come to be?
does nebula mean anything, or did someone make it up?

I dunno, I've just never really thought about the game mode names before in depth :)

Thanks.
body_tagged:
Hey everyone, i don't mean the game itself, but how did the NAME for Nebula come to be?
does nebula mean anything, or did someone make it up?

I dunno, I've just never really thought about the game mode names before in depth :)

Thanks.
title: How did 'Nebula' come to be?

replies.body:
One thing im sure of is that ParaPenguin originally created the "Nebula" plugin and the IvyCode took over the development.

Im not sure if the name comes from ParaPenguin however...

Someone will have to either confirm or deny that
replies.body_tagged:
One thing im sure of is that ParaPenguin originally created the "Nebula" plugin and the IvyCode took over the development.

Im not sure if the name comes from ParaPenguin however...

Someone will have to either confirm or deny that

replies.body: Name comes from ParaPenguin. Chosen because it sounded cool.
replies.body_tagged: Name comes from ParaPenguin. Chosen because it sounded cool.

replies.body:
haha oh okay thanks :)
well fair enough, because it does sound awesome :)
replies.body_tagged:
haha oh okay thanks :)
well fair enough, because it does sound awesome :)

replies.body:
Well, when you do a lot of writing, it's imperative that you have a wide vocabulary — to sound fancier, to be as descriptively accurate as possible, and so on. You can make lots of casual things sound formal if you choose the right wordings...

Ah, but I digress. Someone stop me before I stray off-topic.
